title: Afa nwng ankhou manw
lyrics:
Afa nwng ankhou manw 
Lenghorbai thayw, gaoni jaigayao -2
(A)
Janw hagou Afa nwngni lenghornaia
 mwnse thanki -2
Dinwigwn nwng gwjwnpuriao
“Gaoni jaigayao” -2
(B)
Nathai afa Ang  mwdainw burkhainayao
Gwlwdwng papni buhumao -2
Oblabw nagara nwng angkhou
“Ang papi khou” -2
